General.Name: Biomx Inc
General.Description: BiomX Inc., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, develops products using natural and engineered phage technologies designed to target and kill specific harmful bacteria associated with chronic diseases. The company is developing BX211, a phage therapy, which is in phase 2 clinical study for the treatment of diabetic foot osteomyelitis. It also developing BX004, a phage therapy for cystic fibrosis and non-cystic fibrosis bronchiectasis patients with chronic pulmonary infections caused by Pseudomonas aeruginosa that is in Phase 1b/2a clinical trials. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Ness Ziona, Israel.

5.Name: Dr. Timothy K. Lu M.D., Ph.D.
5.Title: Scientific Founder
